title: Caplin & Massiah
text:
Caplin & Massiah is a UK music duo formed in 2024 by producer Paul Caplin and singer Zeeteah Massiah. Their musical influences include afrobeats, reggae, dancehall, funk, disco, hip hop, blues and soul.
Paul Caplin began his musical career in the New Romantic rock group Animal Magnet before becoming the “mastermind” behind the 1980s avant-garde new wave pop project Haysi Fantayzee, with whom he had three hit singles, and an album that went gold. He went on to a successful career as a technology entrepreneur before returning to the world of music to work with Massiah.
Caplin and Massiah have been together since 2010 and were married in 2016. 
In 2024 the couple began a new musical project as a duo, styled as 'Caplin & Massiah'. They have released a single called Dance To It and plan to release an album in February 2025, to be called Chemistry.
